evidence: In the continuous case, we do the same thing using integrals.

concepts.term: extend the idea to two dimensions

evidence: The slide explicitly presents the continuous convolution formula as representing the operation.
triples.o: f(x,y) * g(x,y) = ∫ ∫ f(τ1,τ2) · g(x−τ1,y−τ2) dτ1 dτ2
